manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_gicai_jizi` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `fxtitle` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `fximg` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `eqcode` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zi1` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `kn1` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `jl1` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `lg1` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `zi2` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `kn2` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `jl2` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `lg2` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `zi3` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `kn3` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `jl3` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `lg3` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zi4` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `kn4` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `jl4` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `lg4` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zi5` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `sl5` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `kn5` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `jl5` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `lg5` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `color` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `totals` int(11) NOT NULL, `xyxtime` int(10) NOT NULL, `numbers` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `startime` int(10) NOT NULL, `endtime` int(10) NOT NULL, `passwords` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `footercopy` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, `cyrs` int(10) NOT NULL, `zjrs` int(10) NOT NULL, `addtime` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_gicai_jizi_rank` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `pid` int(11) NOT NULL, `wxid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `tel` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `headimg` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zi` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `share` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `clicks` int(10) NOT NULL, `state` int(11) NOT NULL, `addtime` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_gicai_jizi_user` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `pid` int(11) NOT NULL, `wxid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `tel` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `headimg` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zi1` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zi2` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zi3` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zi4` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zi5` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `share` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `clicks` int(10) NOT NULL, `state` int(11) NOT NULL, `addtime` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
